meta.title: Home - Griswold Public Schools

input.title: search
input.style: width: 100%; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: -0.0625em 0px 0px; height: 1.25em; outline: none;

div.div: About UsThe Griswold Public Schools offer a comprehensive educational program to over 2,200 students in grades PreK through 12

li.a: Director of Curriculum, Instruction and Assessment

div.div: Our Schools OfferA vigorous academic climate and high expectations for all students are at the core of our educational community.

Our CommunityGriswold is a rural community dotted with rivers, lakes, dairy and Christmas tree farms. The Town of Griswold contains many beautiful hills and small mountains. The two rivers that flow through the town are the Pachaug and the Quinebaug.

div.div: Useful ResourcesOur uniqueness, our individuality, and our life experience molds us into fascinating beings.

article.h2: GRISWOLD PUBLIC SCHOOLS CONTINUOUS LEARNING PLANS

p.strong: PLEASE SELECT THE SCHOOL YOUR CHILD ATTENDS TO ACCESS

div.p: Beginning Monday, March 16th, Griswold Public Schools Food Service will offer all students under 18 "grab and go" breakfast and lunch from 10:00 am to 2:00pm at the Griswold Middle School cafeteria area. Students will stop by the outside of the GMS cafeteria, where they will be greeted by one of our Food Services personnel to retrieve both lunch and breakfast. We are happy to offer this service to all students under 18 until further notice. Should you have any questions about this service, please call our direct line at 860-376-7600.
